# deviceCurrentTime

**Instance Property**

The time, in seconds, of the host audio device.

## Declaration

```swift
var deviceCurrentTime: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property value to schedule audio recording using the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioRecorder/record(atTime:)] and [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioRecorder/record(atTime:forDuration:)] methods.

## Accessing recorder timing

- **currentTime**: The time, in seconds, since the beginning of the recording.
